description:
### Note: Open Source ELK Stack Server does not work with agents that are based on Elastic Paid License. The apache 2.0 license (OSS) packages are limited in what it can support with ELK.

## Metricbeat - OSS is open-source, based on Apache2.0 License which is for open source ELK Stack.

Metricbeat helps you monitor your servers and the services they host by collecting metrics from the operating system and services.

This guide describes how to get started quickly with metrics collection. You’ll learn how to:

 * install Metricbeat on each system you want to monitor
 * specify the metrics you want to collect
 * send the metrics to Elasticsearch
 * visualize the metrics data in Kibana

 ![metricbeat-system-dashboard](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/beats/metricbeat/current/images/metricbeat-system-dashboard.png)
summary: Metricbeat helps you monitor your servers and the services they host by collecting metrics from the operating system and services.
author: ElasticSearch
